name: Plants Vs. Zombies Top Down Tower Defense
name_original: Plants Vs. Zombies Top Down Tower Defense
description:
Ummm, Click on the Sun to pick Plants

Click Plants to select them

Click somewhere on the Yard to place them (as long as there isn't a Red Box around them)

Click the Zombie face to start wave

Click and Drag the Plant onto the Shovel to remove it.
